title: Interview with an Icon: Jennifer Love Hewitt
itunes:title: Interview with an Icon: Jennifer Love Hewitt
itunes:subtitle: Danny welcomes the wonderful/perfect Jennifer Love Hewitt to the show. They talk about her career-- the I Know What You Did Last Summer franchise, the potential reboot, a Can't Hardly Wait sequel, a future for Heartbreakers, former flames, her new...
description:
Danny welcomes the wonderful/perfect Jennifer Love Hewitt to the show. They talk about her career-- the I Know What You Did Last Summer franchise, the potential reboot, a Can't Hardly Wait sequel, a future for Heartbreakers, former flames, her new wine (JLH Wine available at Winehouse.com), Fox's 9-1-1, The Client List, and SO much more.


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
